Introduction

Features

Springfield is Startup-Toolkit for Java Web Application Development.

  • POJO oriented
  • Code of Convention
  • Support Spring @MVC
  • Support Restful URL
  • Support ORM (JPA, hibernate)
  • Support SQL Mapper (myBatis)
  • Support Document Store(Mongodb)
  • Support Multi-View.
